participant_1.background:
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i ve been married five times.
I wear comfortable clothing so I can feel my best while taking walks.
I've been to many exotic places, but my favorite is Japan

I like to think about my childhood.
I like to eat mangoes when they're ripe and sweet.
i like to play video games.
i like eating vegetables.
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks. What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to play video games, and I also like to garden.
That's cool. I love to garden too. Have you ever been to Japan?
I haven't, but I've always wanted to go. It looks like a beautiful place.
It is! I went there a few years ago and had a great time.
What was your favorite part about it?
I loved the food and the culture. The people were very friendly and welcoming.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure I'll love it if I ever get to go.
I hope you do! It's definitely a place worth visiting.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'll have to put it on my list.
No problem. I'm glad I could help.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks, read, and watch movies.
That's cool. I like to do all of those things too.
We should hang out sometime. We could go for a walk or something.
That sounds like fun. I'd love to hang out.
Great! I'll send you a message sometime.
